# [Moses](Moses.html) Messiah Marschierer

Some interpreters of the Quran took the word masÄ«á¸¥ to be derived not from the root m-s-á¸¥, but rather from the root s-y-á¸¥, meaning 'to travel', believing Jesus to have received this title because of his itinerant lifestyle.
